name: OSSystemExtensionRequest
desc: A request to activate or deactivate a system extension.

items.name: class func activationRequest(forExtensionWithIdentifier: String, queue: DispatchQueue) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a request to activate a System Extension.

items.name: class func deactivationRequest(forExtensionWithIdentifier: String, queue: DispatchQueue) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a request to deactivate a System Extension.

items.name: var delegate: OSSystemExtensionRequestDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate to receive updates about the progress of a request.

items.name: protocol OSSystemExtensionRequestDelegate
items.desc: A type that receives updates about the progress of a request.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The bundle identifier of the target extension.

items.name: class func propertiesRequest(forExtensionWithIdentifier: String, queue: DispatchQueue) -> Self
